posts.name: Trevor Biller
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.52.0-beta.1. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • Additional small tweaks, bug fixes, and assorted plans for the future.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.51.0-beta.3…v7.52.0-beta.1 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub

New Version: 7.52.0-beta.1

56 new commits since 7.51.0-beta.3:

Show commits

  • v7.52.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Use Libsignal to validate sealed-sender certificates [2]

  • Update attachment error handling for 403 status responses [3]

  • Bump version of ringrtc ADM prod remote config. [4]

  • Bump @signalapp/sqlcipher to 2.0.0 [5]

  • Fix icu string [6]

  • Better preload time counting [7]

  • Fix restarting provisioner loop [8]

  • Update electron to 35.1.4 [9]

  • Fix internal logo size [10]

  • Update backup handling of messages with an expireTimer [11]

  • Fix avatar color consistency [12]

  • Move websocket preconnect earlier into startup [13]

  • Add remaining features to fun picker [14]

  • Do not show emojis when displaying name only [15]

  • Lazy-load mac-screen-share C++ addon [16]

  • Update to the latest SignalService.proto [17]

  • Fix local preview width [18]

  • Calling: Improve the Picture-in-Picture popout [19]

  • Override electron/node-gyp dependency [20]

  • Disable sccache in github actions [21]

  • Actually fix local preview container size [22]

  • Add modal alert for users with critical-idle-primary-device alert [23]

  • Translate emoji names everywhere [24]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.50.5 [25]

  • Fix link-and-sync cancellation [26]

  • Add danger rule to check all pnpm-lock.yaml dependencies have integrity [27]

  • Release notes for 7.51 [28]

  • Update strings [29]

  • Update DNS fallback [30]

  • Wrap mention blot react root with emoji localization provider [31]

  • Fix @electron/rebuild pnpm issue [32]

  • Add offline state to BackupMediaDownloadProgress [33]

  • Fun picker: Emoji skin tones picker and recent gifs [34]

  • Fix reaction skin tone picker [35]

  • Fix flakey edits mock test [36]

  • FunPicker: Keep emoji picker open on select for composition inputs [37]

  • Reduce ICU book build size [38]

  • Add backup validation to settings [39]

  • Use signed nsis package [40]

  • Calling PiP enhancements [41]

  • Fix join group modal [42]

  • MessageReceiver: Process messages from queue before websocket [43]

  • CallingLobby: Ensure your avatar is centered when camera is off [44]

  • Update support URL for startup DB error dialog [45]

  • Fix test-electron on macos CI [46]

  • Fix batch attachment download renaming and overwriting files [47]

  • Be resilient to invalid incrementalMac value [48]

  • Fix digest for nsis-3.0.4.1.7z [49]

  • Show list of members in a group in ConversationHero [50]

  • Remove Release Notes Hash Check [51]

  • Fix backup export error for invalid serviceId [52]

  • Fix roundtripping of voice notes with body [53]

  • Release notes for 7.52 [54]

  • Update strings [55]

  • 7.52.0-beta.1 [56]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.51.0-beta.3…v7.52.0-beta.1

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).

At least 67 languages changed since 7.51.0-beta.3:

For technical reasons, not all languages may be listed below. However, everything from “Updated language translations” and similar commits is listed, so the list is likely complete. You can view the full comparison to 7.51.0-beta.3 so far here.

Show changes
  • Afrikaans (af-ZA)
  • Albanian (sq-AL)
  • Arabic (ar)
  • Azerbaijani (az-AZ)
  • Basque (eu)
  • Bengali (bn-BD)
  • Bosnian (bs-BA)
  • Bulgarian (bg-BG)
  • Burmese (my)
  • Catalan (ca)
  • Chinese (zh-CN)
  • Chinese (zh-HK)
  • Croatian (hr-HR)
  • Czech (cs)
  • Danish (da)
  • Dutch (nl)
  • English (en)
  • Estonian (et-EE)
  • Finnish (fi)
  • French (fr)
  • Galician (gl-ES)
  • Georgian (ka-GE)
  • German (de)
  • Gujarati (gu-IN)
  • Hebrew (he)
  • Hindi (hi-IN)
  • Hungarian (hu)
  • Indonesian (id)
  • Irish (ga-IE)
  • Italian (it)
  • Japanese (ja)
  • Kannada (kn-IN)
  • Kazakh (kk-KZ)
  • Khmer (km-KH)
  • Kirghiz (ky-KG)
  • Korean (ko)
  • Latvian (lv-LV)
  • Lithuanian (lt-LT)
  • Macedonian (mk-MK)
  • Malay (macrolanguage) (ms)
  • Malayalam (ml-IN)
  • Marathi (mr-IN)
  • Modern Greek (1453-) (el)
  • Norwegian Bokmål (nb)
  • Panjabi (pa-IN)
  • Persian (fa-IR)
  • Polish (pl)
  • Portuguese (pt-BR)
  • Portuguese (pt-PT)
  • Romanian (ro-RO)
  • Russian (ru)
  • Serbian (sr)
  • Slovak (sk-SK)
  • Slovenian (sl-SI)
  • Spanish (es)
  • Swahili (macrolanguage) (sw)
  • Swedish (sv)
  • Tagalog (tl-PH)
  • Tamil (ta-IN)
  • Telugu (te-IN)
  • Thai (th)
  • Turkish (tr)
  • Uighur (ug)
  • Ukrainian (uk-UA)
  • Urdu (ur)
  • Vietnamese (vi)
  • Yue Chinese (yue)

Localization changes for the release are the same, as this is the first build of the release.
Previous beta: Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.51 release - #33 by Whatnoww

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.51 release

posts.cooked:
The new sticker selector has issues with scrolling horizontally. I usually grab a sticker pack icon and move horizontally to select the pack I want (I have more than a few packs, so scrolling vertically takes too long).

This used to work well, but now I can only scroll one pack at a time. I click on a pack icon, move the mouse and it only moves one pack to the left, then stops, no matter how much I move the mouse. I am sure it used to be a lot smoother and moved much further at a time.

The current way makes it quite cumbersome to find the sticker I want.

In the case where a GIF fails to load after selecting a GIF from the GIF selector there’s no button for retrying to load the GIF, cancelling is the only option:

Screenshot352×391 6.81 KB

I’m using Signal Desktop behind a proxy (Tor). Unfortunately I keep getting this error:

Couldn’t load GIFs. Check your connection and try again Retry

When trying to load any GIF. Debug log info:

posts.name: Yash Aggarwal
posts.cooked: Thank you for the report, we will investigate! Can you submit your full debug log so we can investigate further?

Thank you! Here’s a full debug log:

PrivateBin

PrivateBin

Visit this link to see the note. Giving the URL to anyone allows them to access the note, too.

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.53 release.
